title: Stuck in Process of Transferring!!!
body:
My account was in EUW. I payd for trasnferring to NA because I have friends there.

However, after selecting to transfer it stuck in your account is in the processo of transferring. I am more than 4 hours waiting for that.

I had done this transfer before, and it was smoth. However, now I am stuck. Maybe because I have another account in NA with same login name, but it would not be a problem, because I would just have to rename the transfered one.

I am waiting to play.

replies.body: It looks like the transfer has gone through and this account is on the NA server now. I noticed the boards are still showing you on EUW, so I synced your profile to make sure that gets updated!

It changed automatically to an veryy old account user. Why? ... It changed the server and did not asked to me to change my name. My name on EUW was Echo of Hatred. And now it picked up an old account login user and sumoner name. I want to choose another name...

Since you were on the NA server at one point in time, the system saw that someone had your current name so it looked for any past names that weren't currently being used. If you reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) we can look at when you paid for that name change to see what we can do.

But which login user should I use to login? That's strange. There was already one Will4ever2 account in NA server. The system should had asked me to choose another login user. Right?

What should I use to login? ...
